lines.text: A naked American man stole my balloons.
Stay on the road. Keep clear of the moors.
Beware the moon, lads.
[trying to get arrested in Trafalgar Square]
Queen Elizabeth is a man! Prince Charles is a faggot! Winston Churchill was full of shit! Shakespeare's French!
I will not be threatened by a walking meat loaf!
He's a Jew.
How do you know?
I've had a look.
It's a full moon...

[remembering the warning they received]
Beware the moon...
And stick to the road. Oops.
I vote we go back to the Slaughtered Lamb.
Nurse!
Listen to me!

[crying]
Nurse!
The undead surround me. Have you ever talked to a corpse? It's boring! I'm lonely! Kill yourself, David, before you kill others.
[David continues crying]
Please don't cry.
Now, I'm really sorry to be upsetting you, but I have to warn you.
Warn me?
We were attacked by a werewolf.

[putting his hands over his ears]
I'm not listening to this!
On the moors, we were attacked by a lycanthrope, a werewolf. I was murdered, an unnatural death, and now I walk the earth in limbo until the werewolf's curse is lifted.
Shut up!
The wolf's bloodline must be severed; the last remaining werewolf must be destroyed. It's you, David.

[while transforming]
I didn't mean to call you a meat loaf, Jack!
Did you hear that?
I heard that.
What was it?
Could be a lot of things.
Yeah?
A coyote.
There aren't any coyotes in England.
The Hound of the Baskervilles.
Pecos Bill.
Heathcliff.
Heathcliff didn't howl!
No, but he was on the moors.
Have you tried talking to a corpse? It's boring.
[Appearing for the first time as the undead]
Can I have a piece of toast?

[describing his funeral]
Debbie Klein cried a lot. So, so, you know what she does? She's soooo grief-stricken, she runs to find solace in Mark Levine's bed.
Mark... Levine?
An asshole! Life mocks me even in death!
You made me miss.
Sorry.
I've never missed that board before.
Puts you in mind of the days of the old demon barber of Fleet Street, don't it?
Sorry?
The murders.
What murders?
Haven't you heard? Last night... six of 'em. All in different parts of the city, all mutilated. He must be a real right maniac, this fella.
[still discussing how David can kill himself in order to lift the curse]
A gun is good.
You just put the gun to your forehead and pull the trigger.
If you put it in your mouth, then you'd be sure not to miss.
Thank you, you're all so thoughtful.
David, you are hurting my feelings!
Hurting your feelings? Has it occurred to you that it might be unsettling to see you arise from the grave to visit me?
[first lines]
That way is Proctor, and over here is the moors. I go this way.
Thanks for the ride, sir. You have lovely sheep.
Boys, keep off the moors, stick to the roads. The best to ya...
Thanks again.
[then to the sheep]
We'll miss you.
Bye girls...

There was this airplane over the Atlantic on its way to New York. It was full of men from the United Nations. So halfway over the ocean the engines run low on petrol so they have to lighten the plane. So they heave out all the baggage, but it's still too heavy. So they chuck out the seats, but it's still too heavy! Finally this Froggy steps up and shouts "Viva la France" and leaps out. Then an Englishman steps up and shouts 'God save the Queen!' and leaps out. But the plane is still too heavy. So the Yank delegate from Texas steps up, shouts, 'Remember the Alamo!' and chucks out the Mexican.
How could there have been witnesses? It was so dark. We were running, and I fell and Jack went to help me up, and this thing came from nowhere. I don't know what they're talking about.

[to Dr. Hirsch]
He'll change, He'll...
THAT'S ENOUGH!... That's enough.
Benjamin, have you ever been severely beaten about the face and neck?

[looking out the window as the werewolf kills two people]
Sean, I think there are some hooligans in the park again.
Here! Who's there?
That's not Winston!
Look! There!
Mary, mother of God!
Maybe it's a sheep dog... let's keep going.
I'm going to the police. Jack was right.
Jack is dead!
Jack is dead and six people are dead. There's gonna be a full moon tonight. I'm going to the cops.
David, please be rational. Let's go to Dr. Hirsch.
Yeah, be rational, sure. I'm a fucking werewolf, for Christ's sake!
I'm a werewolf.
Are you alright?
I don't know, I'll let you know the next full moon.

[to himself]
I'm going completely crazy.
There is nothing mediocre about Debbie Klein's body.
Shall I be forced to feed you, David?
You scared me, you shithead!
These dumb ass kids. They never appreciate what you do for them.
Ah, fuck, David... what IS THAT?
Those sheep shit on my pack.

[to the truck driver]
You have very beautiful sheep.
Beware the moon, David.
[last lines]
I love you David.
Maybe its a sheep dog... lets keep going

[sees Jack in bathroom mirror and screams]
You're not real!
Ah, dont be a putz David, come here. A nurse huh.?

[close's door]
shhh, come on.
[to Jack]
what are you doing here?
I wanted to see you
[picks up Mickey mouse figure; high pitched]
Hi, David.
Put that down! Ok you've seen me now go away.
I'm sorry I'm upsetting you David, but you don't understand what's going on.
I understand all right, you're one of the undead and I'm a werewolf.
Yes, that's right.
Get out of here Jack.
Tomorrow night's the full moon, you're gonna change you'll become...
I know, I know... A monster.
You gotta kill yourself David, before it's too late.
Are you really dead Jack?
What do you think?
I think I've lost my mind i think you're not, I think you're just another part of bad dream.
You've gotta believe me David.
Believe what?, that tomorrow night under the full moon I'll grow hair and fang's and eat people, bullshit!
Oh goddamnit David please believe me!, you'll kill and make others like me I'm not having a nice time here. You gotta take your own life.
I will not accept this, go away!
This is not pretend David.
I will not be threatened by a walking meatloaf.

[accusing David of his murder]
Whereas I am a victim of your carnivorous lunar activities.
Don't ask me, I'm just an orderly. I push things around.
